chapter.p: 5Hear the word of Yahweh, you who are frightened at his word:

ul.li1: Your brothers who hate you,
ul.li2: who exclude you for my name’s sake have said,
ul.li1: “Let Yahweh be honored so thatOr “and” we may see your joy!”
ul.li2: ButOr “And” they themselves shall be ashamed.

ul.li2: A voice from the temple!

ul.li2: Who has seen anything like these things?
ul.li1: Can a land be born in one day?
ul.li2: Or can a nation be born in a moment?

chapter.p: Yet when she was in labor, Zion indeed gave birth to her children.
